title: WYSIWYG CKFinder is not installed
name: Drupal-7:acquiaWYSIWYGCKFinderDisabled
description: Create a symlink to your private files area.
remediation: Disable the WYSIWYG CKFinder module: `drush pm-uninstall wysiwyg_ckfinder -y`.
success: The WYSIWYG CKFinder module is not currently enabled.
failure: The WYSIWYG CKFinder module is currently enabled.

module.description: The name of the module to ensure is not installed.
